真偽のほど: (しんぎのほど) - whether it is true or not
真偽の程: (しんぎのほど) - whether it is true or not
真偽を確かめる: (しんぎをたしかめる) - to make sure of the truth
真偽不明: (しんぎふめい) - (yoji) dubious; doubtful; of unknown authenticity
真先: (まさき) - the head; the foremost; beginning; the very front
真円真珠: (しんえんしんじゅ) - cultured pearls
真冬日: (まふゆび) - day on which the temperature fails to reach 0 degrees Centigrade
真剣: (shinken) - sério, sério; espada real (em oposição a uma arma de prática sem fio ou de madeira)
真剣勝負: (しんけんしょうぶ) - (yoji) fighting with real swords; game played in real earnest
真勇: (しんゆう) - true courage; true heroism
真只中: (まっただなか) - right in the midst of; right at the height of
真名: (まんな) - kanji (as opposed to kana); printed-style writing
真名本: (まなぼん) - book (etc.) written entirely in kanji
真向: (まっこう) - directly opposite/right in front; middle of the forehead; helmet front
真向い: (まむかい) - face to face; facing; straight ahead; just in front of; directly opposite
真向かい: (まむかい) - face to face; facing; straight ahead; just in front of; directly opposite
真向き: (まむき) - earnest; singlehanded; face to face; straight ahead; just in front of
真向こう: (まむこう) - face to face; facing; straight ahead; just in front of; directly opposite
真向法: (まっこうほう) - makko-ho (set of four exercises for general health)
真善美: (しんぜんび) - the true, the good, and the beautiful
真因: (しんいん) - true reason; true motive
真壁: (しんかべ) - wall with exposed timber pillars
真夏の暑さ: (まなつのあつさ) - heat of high summer
真夏日: (まなつび) - day on which the temperature exceeds 30 degrees Centigrade
真夜中: (まよなか) - dead of night; midnight
真如: (しんにょ) - tathata (the ultimate nature of all things)
真字: (しんじ) - kanji (as opposed to kana); printed-style writing
真字本: (まなぼん) - book (etc.) written entirely in kanji
真宗大谷派: (しんしゅうおおたには) - Otani sect of Shinshu
真実: (shinjitsu) - verdade, realidade; verdadeiramente, realmente; verdade, realidade; verdadeiramente, realmente; verdade absoluta
真実と向き合う: (しんじつとむきあう) - to face the truth
真実と向合う: (しんじつとむきあう) - to face the truth
真実に迫る: (しんじつにせまる) - to close in on the truth
真実を語る: (しんじつをかたる) - to speak the truth
真実一路: (しんじついちろ) - (yoji) path of sincerity
真実味: (しんじつみ) - truth (veracity, authenticity) (e.g. of a report)
真実性: (しんじつせい) - fidelity; truth; authenticity; credibility
真巨頭: (マゴンドウ) - short-finned pilot whale (Globicephala macrorhynchus)
真帆: (まほ) - spread-out sail; full sail; (sailing) downwind
真平: (まっぴら) - (not) by any means; (not) for anything; humbly; sincerely
真当: (まっとう) - proper/respectable/decent/honest; (全う only)   entirely/completely/wholly/perfectly
真意: (しんい) - real intention; true motive; true meaning
真拆: (まさき) - Asiatic jasmine (Trachelospermum asiaticum); Asian jasmine
真拆の葛: (まさきのかずら) - Asiatic jasmine (Trachelospermum asiaticum); Asian jasmine
真拆葛: (まさきずら) - Asiatic jasmine (Trachelospermum asiaticum); Asian jasmine
真旦: (しんだん) - (orig. from the Sanskrit 'Cinasthana') (ancient) China
真暗: (まっくら) - total darkness/pitch dark; bleak future/poor prospects
真暗闇: (まっくらやみ) - pitch dark; total darkness
真書: (しんしょ) - square style; another name for "kaisho"
真最中: (まっさいちゅう) - midst; middle of; height of
真木瓜: (まぼけ) - Choenomeles lagenaria; maboke flowering quince
真果: (しんか) - true fruit (i.e. one that forms from the ovary only)
真柱: (しんばしら) - central pillar of a pagoda; leader of the Tenri religion
真核微生物: (しんかくびせいぶつ) - eukaryotic microorganism; eucaryotic microorganism
真核生物: (しんかくせいぶつ) - eukaryote; eucaryote
真核細胞: (しんかくさいぼう) - eukaryotic cell
真桑瓜: (マクワウリ) - oriental melon (Cucumis melo var. Makuwa)
真榊: (まさかき) - evergreen (esp. one planted or used at a shrine)
真正: (しんせい) - genuine; authentic; true; pure
真正午: (しんしょうご) - apparent noon; true noon
真正後生動物: (しんせいこうせいどうぶつ) - eumetazoa
真正後生動物亜界: (しんせいこうせいどうぶつあかい) - Eumetazoa; clade containing most animal groups
真正細菌: (しんせいさいきん) - bacteria; eubacteria
